scripts.build: rimraf dist/ && npm run pre-build && node --max_old_space_size=4096 ./node_modules/@stencil/core/bin/stencil build --docs
scripts.build:ds: npm run build && npm run pre-build:storybook && npm run build:storybook
scripts.build:storybook-windows: cross-env BUILD_TARGET="netlify" npm run pre-build:storybook && cross-env BUILD_TARGET="netlify" build-storybook -c .storybook -o dist/docs/
scripts.build:storybook: rimraf dist/docs/ && cross-env BUILD_TARGET="netlify" npm run pre-build:storybook && cross-env BUILD_TARGET="netlify" build-storybook -c .storybook -o dist/docs/ && cp -R www/assets dist/docs/assets
scripts.build:npm: npm i && npm run test && cross-env BUILD_TARGET="npm" npm run build
scripts.build:www: npm i && rimraf www && cross-env BUILD_TARGET="www" npm run build && cross-env BUILD_TARGET="www" npm run build:storybook
scripts.build:docs-assets: npm run build:www && rimraf docs/static/ && make-dir docs/static && cp -R storybook docs/static/storybook && cp -R dist docs/static/dist
scripts.build:docs: npm run build:docs-assets && npm run docs:build
scripts.start: set NODE_ENV=development&& concurrently "npm run pre-build" "node --max_old_space_size=4096 ./node_modules/@stencil/core/bin/stencil build --dev --watch --recursive --serve"
scripts.watch: set NODE_ENV=development&& concurrently "npm run pre-build" "node --max_old_space_size=4096 ./node_modules/@stencil/core/bin/stencil build --watch --recursive --serve"
scripts.storybook: npm run pre-build:storybook && npm-run-all --parallel watch storybook.run
scripts.docs:start: cd docs && npm run clean && npm run develop
scripts.docs:build: cd docs && npm install && npm run clean && npm run build --prefix-paths && rimraf public/assets/assets
